author: Jay Leber
comment: Appears on the phone so you know it installed.   But never appears on the watch.  Don't waste your time.  Nothing to see here (on your watch) .
title: Looks nice on Google Play, never appears on watch.

author: Lee White
comment: App does not appear on my LG G watch R and when I open the app on my Samsung Galaxy Note 3 I just get an information screen and nothing else.
title: No go.

author: Mike Johnson
comment: Doesnt work on 360 as someone else said.  *** EDIT ***  New version still doesn`t work. however increased to 3 stars because developer took time to reply to first review AND tried to fix problem.

reply.author: Nicolas C Perez
reply.content:
Hi Mike
I deployed a new version of the app's, could you please, download it, and let me know if it work on moto360.
Unfortunately I can not test the app's in all devices, so your experiences and opinions are my references.
Mike thank very much to download it, and please send me your comments.
Have a nice weekend

Best regards
Nicolas

author: T Armstrong
comment: Looks awesome but I cannot get it to launch says unfortunately controls has stopped as soon as I try to launch it

reply.author: Nicolas C Perez
reply.content:
Hi T
I deployed a new version of the app's, could you please, download it, and let me know if it work on moto360.
T your comments are very important to me to improve applications, I will appreciate if you please send me some comments about.
Thanks in advance and have a nice weekend
Nicolas

title: Not working yet on moto360

author: Craig Ueltzen
comment: Never appeared in the Zen Watch. But, the Zen got herky jerky, and suddenly started nagging about missing Google Play Services. I factory reset watch and started over again. Sigh. The dev's stopwatch app works great though. Go figure.
title: Well, I tried.
